docs.snippet: AFFAIRS AT QUARANTINE.- The brig John Stevens from Trinidad de Cuba, schooner chief from Remedies, and John N. Genin from Sagua, were dispatched to the Lower Quarantine yesterday, to await the action of the Board of Health.
docs.lead_paragraph: AFFAIRS AT QUARANTINE.- The brig John Stevens from Trinidad de Cuba, schooner chief from Remedies, and John N. Genin from Sagua, were dispatched to the Lower Quarantine yesterday, to await the action of the Board of Health.

docs.snippet: The Cunard steamship America arrived at this port yesterday, with advices from Liverpool to the 10th inst. She brings no tidings of the Agamemnon and Valorous, the two missing vessels of the telegraphic squadron. The Niagara and Gorgon were still at...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Cunard steamship America arrived at this port yesterday, with advices from Liverpool to the 10th inst. She brings no tidings of the Agamemnon and Valorous, the two missing vessels of the telegraphic squadron. The Niagara and Gorgon were still at Queenstown.

headline.main: PROVIDENCE.; Turned Back by the Faculty--AllOpathy South on Homeopathy North--Influence of the Price of Cotton on the Manufacture--Origin of the Manufacture in the United States--Samuel States--Progress of Manufacturing until 1815--The Baltic Mills.

docs.abstract: History of the manufacture in the U.S.
docs.lead_paragraph: Justly concerned, perhaps, at the cavernous sounds emitted by a naturally vigorous pair of lungs, which explosions have an ominous resemblance to voices from the tombs, my friends have sent me to the established homeopathist of the place, and he very candidly advises me to get out of this New-England air with all convenient speed, which advice I shall certainly take before this inquisitive northeast wind shall further lacerate my too susceptible bosom.

headline.main: SEA AND SHIP NEWS.; Ship Tornado.

docs.snippet: ADDRESS BY GOVERNOR W. SMITH. Yesterday, at 3 o'clock P. M., the corner stone of the new Island Hospital-an Institution designed to take the place of that destroyed by fire some months since, on Blackwell's Island-was laid with appropriate...

headline.main: Laying of the Corner-Stone of the Island Hospital.

docs.lead_paragraph: ADDRESS BY GOVERNOR W. SMITH. Yesterday, at 3 o'clock P. M., the corner stone of the new Island Hospital-an Institution designed to take the place of that destroyed by fire some months since, on Blackwell's Island-was laid with appropriate ceremonial, and in the presence of some three hundred spectators. The ceremony was performed by WASHINGTON SMITH, Esq., President of the Board of Ten Governors. The day was auspicious,

docs.snippet: From the Vicksburg True Southron. The General was one of the victims of the National Hotel poisoning, having dined there on that fatal day which has cost thirty-one persons their lives, and destroyed the health of sixty or seventy more. Since that...
docs.lead_paragraph: From the Vicksburg True Southron. The General was one of the victims of the National Hotel poisoning, having dined there on that fatal day which has cost thirty-one persons their lives, and destroyed the health of sixty or seventy more. Since that day General QUITMAN had not a well hour. But so long as he felt that duty to the South and to the Republic demanded his presence in Congress, he faithfully remained there;

docs.lead_paragraph: There have been no arrivals from infected ports directly, at the lower Quarantine as yet, in consequence of the orders recently issued by the Health Officer not being generally known among the pilots The following vessels arrived at the upper Quaran tine Wednesday night and this morning, and were immediately ordered down the Bay: Ship Silas Holmes, from New-Orleans, barks Celia, W. headline.main: LETTERS FROM WATERING PLACES.; Central Moriches, L. I.--The Way to Get There--The Wreck of the Steamer Franklin--Fishing, &c.

docs.lead_paragraph: Every hard-worKing weeK-day horse has a natural longing for ease and his oats-for fresh pasturage in which he may fling out his heels, right. left, and every side, without fear or hindrance,neigh, whinny, prick his ears, whisk his tail without entanglement in traces, and do all and divers such other acts and evolutions with his own proper body as unto him may seem desirable or healthful.
